DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD WATCH
DOC.TEXT: EU Jobless Rate Drops Modestly : The rate of unemployment in the European Union edged down to 10.8 % in July , the second consecutive drop from the peak of 11 % in May , according to Eurostat , the European Commission ' s statistics office . In a separate report on European employment , the commission warned that too many Europeans remain unemployed and that joblessness is not declining fast enough .
